title: DropFi Extension
description: The DropFi Chrome Extension brings the power of the XRP Ledger directly to your browser, enabling seamless interaction with DApps and Web3 applications.

components.title: DropFi Chrome Extension
components.subtitle: Access XRPL directly from your browser

components.text: The DropFi Chrome Extension brings the power of the XRP Ledger directly to users' browsers, enabling seamless interaction with DApps and Web3 applications. Connect to any XRPL DApp with a single click and manage your XRP and tokens securely.

features.title: Direct Browser Integration
features.description: Connect to any XRPL DApp with a single click

features.title: Popup & Expanded Views
features.description: Quick access through popup or full-screen management

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure encryption with user-defined passwords

features.title: Developer Friendly
features.description: Full window.xrpl API for DApp integration

steps.title: Visit Chrome Web Store
steps.description: Search for "DropFi Wallet" or visit the Chrome Web Store
steps.details: Navigate to the Chrome Web Store and locate the DropFi Wallet extension

steps.title: Add to Chrome
steps.description: Click "Add to Chrome" and confirm permissions
steps.details: Review the permissions and click "Add extension" to install

steps.title: Pin for Easy Access
steps.description: Click the puzzle piece icon and pin DropFi Wallet
steps.details: This ensures quick access to your wallet from the browser toolbar

steps.title: Set Up Your Wallet
steps.description: Create a new wallet or import an existing one
steps.details: Follow the setup wizard to secure your wallet with a password

tips.title: Browser Compatibility
tips.description: DropFi Extension works with Chrome, Edge, and other Chromium-based browsers.

tips.title: Permissions Required
tips.description: The extension requires access to read and change data on websites you visit.

components.text: Once installed, follow these steps to get started with your DropFi Extension:

steps.title: Create or Import Wallet
steps.description: Set up a new wallet or import using your seed phrase
steps.details: For new users, DropFi will generate a secure 24-word seed phrase. Write this down and store it safely.

steps.title: Set Password
steps.description: Create a strong password for wallet access
steps.details: This password encrypts your wallet data locally on your device

steps.title: Add Funds
steps.description: Transfer XRP or purchase directly within the extension
steps.details: You can buy XRP using various payment methods or transfer from other wallets

steps.title: Explore Features
steps.description: Start using token swapping, liquidity provision, and NFT trading
steps.details: Your extension is now ready to connect to DApps and manage XRPL assets

components.text: The DropFi Extension provides comprehensive functionality for managing your XRPL assets:

features.title: Sending and Receiving
features.description: Easily send and receive XRP and other tokens

features.title: Token Management
features.description: Manage trust lines and issued tokens directly

features.title: DApp Connection
features.description: Seamlessly connect to and interact with various DApps

features.title: Transaction History
features.description: View complete transaction history and details

components.text: Common actions you can perform with the DropFi Extension:

steps.title: Send XRP
steps.description: Click the DropFi icon, click "Send," enter recipient address and amount, then confirm with your password
steps.details: Transactions are processed quickly on the XRP Ledger with minimal fees

steps.title: Connect to DApp
steps.description: Visit any XRPL DApp, click "Connect Wallet," approve the connection in the DropFi popup
steps.details: Start interacting with DApps immediately after connection approval

steps.title: View NFTs
steps.description: Click the DropFi icon, navigate to the NFTs tab, browse your collection, click any NFT for details
steps.details: Manage and trade your NFT collection directly from the extension

steps.title: Check Balances
steps.description: View your XRP balance and token holdings at a glance
steps.details: Real-time balance updates and transaction confirmations

features.title: Popup View
features.description: Quick access to essential functions and balances

features.title: Expanded View
features.description: Full-screen interface for detailed wallet management

features.title: Settings Panel
features.description: Configure security, appearance, and advanced options

features.title: Transaction Panel
features.description: View and manage your transaction history

components.text: Configure your extension's security settings for maximum protection:

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Set and change your wallet access password

features.title: Auto-Lock Timer
features.description: Configure automatic wallet locking for security

features.title: Transaction Confirmation
features.description: Require password confirmation for all transactions

features.title: DApp Permissions
features.description: Manage which DApps can access your wallet

tips.title: Password Security
tips.description: Use a strong, unique password and never share it with anyone.

tips.title: Regular Updates
tips.description: Keep your extension updated for the latest security features.

features.title: Developer Mode
features.description: Access advanced developer tools and debugging

features.title: Custom Networks
features.description: Connect to testnets and custom XRPL networks

features.title: Hardware Wallet Support
features.description: Connect Ledger and other hardware wallets

features.title: Multi-Signature
features.description: Set up multi-signature accounts for enhanced security

components.text: Connect your DropFi Extension to decentralized applications:

steps.title: Visit a DApp
steps.description: Navigate to any XRPL-compatible decentralized application
steps.details: Look for the "Connect Wallet" or similar button

steps.title: Request Connection
steps.description: Click the connect button and select DropFi Wallet
steps.details: The DApp will request permission to connect to your wallet

steps.title: Approve Connection
steps.description: Review the connection request in the DropFi popup
steps.details: Check the permissions and click "Approve" to connect

steps.title: Start Interacting
steps.description: Use the DApp's features with your connected wallet
steps.details: Transactions will require approval through the extension

tips.title: Permission Review
tips.description: Always review what permissions a DApp is requesting before connecting.

tips.title: Security First
tips.description: Only connect to trusted DApps and never share your seed phrase.

tips.title: Extension Not Loading
tips.description: Try refreshing the page or restarting your browser. Check if the extension is enabled in Chrome settings.

tips.title: Connection Issues
tips.description: Ensure the extension is unlocked and you're not in incognito mode. Check your internet connection.

tips.title: Transaction Failures
tips.description: Verify you have sufficient XRP for fees and the transaction is properly formatted. Check network status.
